scripts.build:prod: npm run build:css --minify && npm run copy-fonts
scripts.browser-sync: browser-sync start --server "src" --files "src/**/*.html, src/**/*.css" --port 3000 --no-notify --no-open --serveStatic "src" --index "audio.html" --middleware "function(req, res, next) { if (req.url === '/') { res.writeHead(302, { 'Location': '/audio.html' }); res.end(); return; } if (!req.url.includes('.')) { req.url += '.html'; } return next(); }"
